ὀρθο-τομέω,
cut in a straight line, τὰς ὁδούς [LXX] teach it aright, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to handle correctly, guide on a straight path
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to cut straight; to handle correctly, guide on a straight path, to set forth truthfully, without perversion, or distortion, 2Tim. 2:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:

2) 沿著正確的路線引導真理的話語 (提後 2:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:

2) 沿着正确的路线引导真理的话语 (提后 2:15)
